description.value:
A witch can soothe the wounds of those she touches. This acts as a @Compendium[pf1.spells.xoc3vhg3btmfjauq]{Cure Light Wounds} spell, using the witch's caster level.

Once a creature has benefited from the healing hex, it cannot benefit from it again for 24 hours.

At 5th level, this hex acts like @Compendium[pf1.spells.e67esdjp4nojtbr7]{Cure Moderate Wounds}.
